blogPost.title:
I would rather see Alabama & Clemson football get broken up than Amazon & Facebook

College football isn’t fun anymore
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
我宁愿看到阿拉巴马州&amp；Clemson足球被拆分，也不愿看到亚马逊&&Facebook分崩离析

大学橄榄球不再有趣了

我寧願看到阿拉巴馬州&amp；Clemson足球被拆分，也不願看到亞馬遜&&Facebook分崩離析

大學橄欖球不再有趣了

The Dunning-Kruger Effect is a cognitive bias in which people with a low ability
of a given task are prone to overestimate their ability at that task. We are
incapable of objective evaluation of our own competency levels. I'm writing
about it as I've come to realise I suffer from it.
